response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations or personal projects. Given its unique features and high quality, I estimate its value to be well above $8,000. To make this opportunity accessible to you, I propose an offer of $12,000 for the product. This price reflects not only its intrinsic value but also the potential benefits it can bring to you. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.", "product_price": 12000}
